CI = 0.18 × CD ($244k); includes field supervision; temporary facilities allocation; HSE; QA/QC field inspection; construction management; small tools; per fallback typical model
P = 0.02 × MAT ($359k); includes equipment sourcing; vendor coordination; PO processing; expediting; receiving inspection; documentation management; per fallback typical model
PM = 0.06 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($647k); includes project management allocation; engineering management; schedule/cost control; contract administration; Terminal coordination; per fallback typical model

COM = 0.03 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($647k); includes commissioning planning; integrated system testing; performance verification; Terminal integration verification per DEC-05; deficiency closeout; training support (PKG-35); handover; per fallback typical model
